name: The Room of Doom
description:
The Room of Doom is a game where you play as Dippy. Sadly for him, he has found himself in a room filled to the brim with dangerous obstacles where he can be burnt, sliced, and smooshed. Try to survive for as long as you can to get a fancy smancy new highscore to show to your many friends. There are three stages, and in my opinion the best is stage 1, second best is stage 3, and the worst is stage 2 (its honestly a mess I have no idea what I was thinking).

Controls:  Use the arrow keys to move and space to jump.
